title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, copies of records shall be provided: (1)
at a rate of 25 cents per page of up to 9
x 14 inches; or
(2)
upon payment of
the actual cost of reproduction, if the record or personal information cannot
be photocopied. (c) The
actual cost of reproduction shall be based upon the average unit cost for
copying a record, excluding fixed costs of the department, such as operator
salaries and overhead. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
703.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
